Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory49.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Roland, have you seen Lamia?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'No. Why are you looking for her?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: "I just want to check on everyone's condition at all times. Lamia is not that stable, and I worry that she will do something strange.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "It'll be okay. Besides, she's used to being alone.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: "Aren't you going to end this female, Roland?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Keep it this way for now. I don't want to lose this beautiful sample yet.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory191.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hey, what did you say?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The park is now deserted, and in the empty corner, Nanami plays in the water while she makes fun of the machine in front her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami doesn't want to work yet! No! Nanami didn't want to work from the beginning!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Work itself represents failure! You get it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Faced with a lecture from Nanami, the machine is motionless, and makes no indication.'}
{3: "In the end, Nanami can't think of any more excuses to use, and the machine finally moves."}
{2: 'Machine', 3: 'Nanami, it is now...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami can't hear you! Can't hear you!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami rolls on the ground like a child throwing a tantrum. The frame has not had its strength adjusted and shatters the floor.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Machine', 3: 'I have no power to stop you either, but Nanami, you have to remember to do what you should do.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami keeps the lying-down pose as she turns her back to the machine and complains.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Anyway, Nanami wants to keep running away, so you guys don't follow me!", 4: '1'}
